resources.string: Check the SMS content using Google Gemini AI, it only requires a google account.

1. Register and login to your Google account:
https://accounts.google.com/

2. Open the API page:
https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey

3. Press the \"Create API key\" button.

4. Copy the key, then fill it in below.
Categorize this SMS message as Political, Fraud, Survey, or Marketing. If none applies, answer \"Valid\", otherwise, answer the category only, don\'t answer anything else. The SMS message is: {sms}

Show icons before the number to indicate whether it exists in the spam database, or does it match any regex rule.

Note:
This can impact the performance when the database is too large or there are too many regex rules.

MMS messages are usually spam, it\'s unnecessary to be enabled unless you actually use them.

Note:
Group messages are MMS, not SMS.

MMS will be treated as SMS, only text content will be processed, multimedia content, such as image and audio, will be ignored.

Two permissions are required: RECEIVE_MMS and READ_SMS
